name: VaMoRadioPodcast
0:
”Alexa, start VaMo Radio Podcast”
”Alexa, play VaMo Radio Podcast”
”Alexa, ask VaMo Radio Podcast what is the current song”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vamo radio podcast
des:
VaMo Radio is a vibrant Chicago station that ignites the music scene with a potent mix of celebrity interviews, explosive up-and-coming artists, and an unwavering dedication to empowering talent.

A Spotlight on New Voices: Forget chasing algorithms and hidden corners. VaMo Radio shines a bright light on the hottest undiscovered artists, amplifying their voices and showcasing their raw talent for the entire city and beyond. From soulful singers to electrifying rappers, expect a sonic surprise around every corner.
Celebrities You Crave: Craving juicy interviews with your favorite stars? VaMo Radio dishes the good stuff! Get the inside scoop on their latest projects, musical inspirations, and maybe even some hilarious (or scandalous) behind-the-scenes stories.
Building Music Careers: VaMo Radio isn't just a platform, it's a launchpad. They offer monthly membership packages that go beyond airtime, crafting press kit interviews, securing killer gigs, and even helping artists land dream record deals and tours. They've seen it happen countless times, from humble beginnings to chart-topping sensations.
24/7 Music Infusion: Craving a non-stop dose of fresh tunes? VaMo Radio pumps your veins with 24/7 airplay of the hottest tracks, both established and up-and-coming. So crank up the volume and let the music paint your world with its vibrant spectrum.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
